subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Bulldogs, who lead the Crimson by one game with one to play, moved a step closer to clinching their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 1962.
snippet: The Bulldogs, who lead the Crimson by one game with one to play, moved a step closer to clinching their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth since 1962.
